verses.text: Now the \w men|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* had \w sworn|strong="H7650"\w* in \w Mizpeh|strong="H4709"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, There shall not \w any|strong="H0376"\w* of us \w give|strong="H5414"\w* his \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* unto \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w* to \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*.

And the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and \w abode|strong="H3427"\w* there till \w even|strong="H6153"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and lifted \w up|strong="H5375"\w* their \w voices|strong="H6963"\w*, and \w wept|strong="H1058"\w* \w sore|strong="H1419"\w*;

And \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, why is this come to pass in \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, that there should be to \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w* \w lacking|strong="H6485"\w* in \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*?

And it came to pass on the \w morrow|strong="H4283"\w*, that the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* rose \w early|strong="H7925"\w*, and \w built|strong="H1129"\w* there an \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, and \w offered|strong="H5927"\w* burnt \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w* and peace \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w*.

And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Who \add is there\add* among all the \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w came|strong="H5927"\w* not up with the \w congregation|strong="H6951"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*? For they had made a \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w oath|strong="H7621"\w* concerning him that came not \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* to \w Mizpeh|strong="H4709"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, He shall \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* be put to \w death|strong="H4191"\w*.

And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w repented|strong="H5162"\w* them for \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w* their \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, There is \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w* cut \w off|strong="H1438"\w* from \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

How shall we \w do|strong="H6213"\w* for \w wives|strong="H0802"\w* for them that \w remain|strong="H3498"\w*, seeing we have \w sworn|strong="H7650"\w* by the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* that we will not \w give|strong="H5414"\w* them of our \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* to \w wives|strong="H0802"\w*?

¶ And they \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, What \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \add is there\add* of the \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* that came not \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to \w Mizpeh|strong="H4709"\w* to the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*? And, behold, there \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w none|strong="H0376"\w* to the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* from \w Jabesh-gilead|strong="H3003"\w* to the \w assembly|strong="H6951"\w*.

For the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* were \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w*, and, behold, \add there were\add* \w none|strong="H0376"\w* of the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Jabesh-gilead|strong="H3003"\w* there.

And the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* thither \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* of the \w valiantest|strong="H1121"\w*, and \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* them, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Go|strong="H3212"\w* and \w smite|strong="H5221"\w* the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Jabesh-gilead|strong="H3003"\w* with the \w edge|strong="H6310"\w* of the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, with the \w women|strong="H0802"\w* and the \w children|strong="H2945"\w*.

And this \add is\add* the \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* that ye shall \w do|strong="H6213"\w*, Ye shall utterly \w destroy|strong="H2763"\w* every \w male|strong="H2145"\w*, and every \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* that hath \w lain|strong="H4904"\w* by \w man|strong="H3045"\w*.\f + \fr 21.11 \ft hath lain…: Heb. knoweth the lying with man\f*

And they \w found|strong="H4672"\w* among the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Jabesh-gilead|strong="H3003"\w* \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w young|strong="H5291"\w* \w virgins|strong="H1330"\w*, that had \w known|strong="H3045"\w* no \w man|strong="H0376"\w* by \w lying|strong="H4904"\w* with any \w male|strong="H2145"\w*: and they \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* them unto the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* to \w Shiloh|strong="H7887"\w*, which \add is\add* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w*.\f + \fr 21.12 \ft young…: Heb. young women virgins\f*

And the whole \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \add some\add* to \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* to the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w* that \add were\add* in the \w rock|strong="H5553"\w* \w Rimmon|strong="H7417"\w*, and to \w call|strong="H7121"\w* \w peaceably|strong="H7965"\w* unto them.\f + \fr 21.13 \ft to speak…: Heb. and spake and called\f*\f + \fr 21.13 \ft call…: or, proclaim peace\f*

And \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w* came \w again|strong="H7725"\w* at that \w time|strong="H6256"\w*; and they \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* them \w wives|strong="H0802"\w* which they had saved \w alive|strong="H2421"\w* of the \w women|strong="H0802"\w* of \w Jabesh-gilead|strong="H3003"\w*: and yet so they \w sufficed|strong="H4672"\w* them not.

And the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w repented|strong="H5162"\w* them for \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*, because that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* had \w made|strong="H6213"\w* a \w breach|strong="H6556"\w* in the \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

¶ Then the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, How shall we \w do|strong="H6213"\w* for \w wives|strong="H0802"\w* for them that \w remain|strong="H3498"\w*, seeing the \w women|strong="H0802"\w* are \w destroyed|strong="H8045"\w* out of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*?

And they \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \add There must be\add* an \w inheritance|strong="H3425"\w* for them that be \w escaped|strong="H6413"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*, that a \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w* be not \w destroyed|strong="H4229"\w* out of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

Howbeit we \w may|strong="H3201"\w* not \w give|strong="H5414"\w* them \w wives|strong="H0802"\w* of our \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*: for the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* have \w sworn|strong="H7650"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Cursed|strong="H0779"\w* \add be\add* he that \w giveth|strong="H5414"\w* a \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* to \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*.

Then they \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Behold, \add there is\add* a \w feast|strong="H2282"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* in \w Shiloh|strong="H7887"\w* \w yearly|strong="H3117"\w* \add in a place\add* which \add is\add* on the north \w side|strong="H6828"\w* of \w Beth-el|strong="H1008"\w*, on the east \w side|strong="H4217"\w* of the \w highway|strong="H4546"\w* that goeth \w up|strong="H5927"\w* from \w Beth-el|strong="H1008"\w* to \w Shechem|strong="H7927"\w*, and on the \w south|strong="H5045"\w* of \w Lebonah|strong="H3829"\w*.\f + \fr 21.19 \ft yearly: Heb. from year to year\f*\f + \fr 21.19 \ft on the east…: or, toward the sunrising\f*\f + \fr 21.19 \ft of the highway: or, on the highway\f*

Therefore they \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Go|strong="H3212"\w* and lie in \w wait|strong="H0693"\w* in the \w vineyards|strong="H3754"\w*;

And \w see|strong="H7200"\w*, and, behold, if the \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Shiloh|strong="H7887"\w* come \w out|strong="H3318"\w* to \w dance|strong="H2342"\w* in \w dances|strong="H4246"\w*, then come ye \w out|strong="H3318"\w* of the \w vineyards|strong="H3754"\w*, and \w catch|strong="H2414"\w* you every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* his \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* of the \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Shiloh|strong="H7887"\w*, and \w go|strong="H1980"\w* to the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*.

And it shall be, when their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* or their \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* unto us to \w complain|strong="H7378"\w*, that we will \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, Be \w favourable|strong="H2603"\w* unto them for our sakes: because we \w reserved|strong="H3947"\w* not to each \w man|strong="H0376"\w* his \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* in the \w war|strong="H4421"\w*: for ye did not \w give|strong="H5414"\w* unto them at this \w time|strong="H6256"\w*, \add that\add* ye should be \w guilty|strong="H0816"\w*.\f + \fr 21.22 \ft Be favourable…: or, Gratify us in them\f*

And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w* did \w so|strong="H6213"\w*, and \w took|strong="H5375"\w* \add them\add* \w wives|strong="H0802"\w*, according to their \w number|strong="H4557"\w*, of them that \w danced|strong="H2342"\w*, whom they \w caught|strong="H1497"\w*: and they \w went|strong="H3212"\w* and \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* unto their \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*, and \w repaired|strong="H1129"\w* the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, and \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* in them.

And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w departed|strong="H1980"\w* thence at that \w time|strong="H6256"\w*, every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* to his \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w* and to his \w family|strong="H4940"\w*, and they went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* from thence every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* to his \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*.

In those \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \add there was\add* no \w king|strong="H4428"\w* in \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \add that which was\add* \w right|strong="H3477"\w* in his own \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*.
